GSP28jsbh2-4u:3: “yāvajjīvaṃ darśapūrṇamāsābhyāṃ yajete” tyatra kāmye eva svargādyarthe darśapūrṇamāsakarmaṇi jīvanaparyāptakālavidhiḥ /
GSP28jsbh2-4u:14: yathā rāhūparāgānvayavyatirekānuvidhāyi avaśyānuṣṭhānaṃ yasya snānasya tadvattvaṃ rāhūparāge /
GSP28jsbh2-4u:17: karaṇe ca 'dharmeṇa pāpamapanudati' ityādivākyaśeṣāt rātrisatranyāyena pāpakṣaya evānuṣaṅgiko nityanaimittikasthale phalam /
GSP28jsbh2-4u:18: yatratu rathantarasāmatvādinimittasattve naimittikasya pāṭhādeva prāptisaṃbhavenānvayānuvidhānasya pramāṇāntareṇa prāptistatra vyatirekānuvidhāna eva vidhestātparyam /
GSP28jsbh2-4u:20: ataśca yāvajjīvapade lāghavādyanurodhena jīvanasya nimittatvāvagatestadanurodhena pāpakṣayārthaṃ viniyogāntaramevedamiti siddham // 1 //
GSP28jsbh2-4u:23: darśapūrṇamāsābhyāṃ svargakāmo yajeteti kāmyaprayogaṃ vidhāya bahvṛcabrāhmaṇe āmnātaṃ vākyamudāharati ---------- yāvajjīvamiti //
GSP28jsbh2-4u:25: atra bhāṣyakāreṇa sūtrānuguṇyena karmadharmatvakartṛdharmatvacintāṃ kṛtāmapi tṛtīyādhyāyasaṃgatāyāstasyā
GSP28jsbh2-4u:26: bhedalakṣaṇe 'paryavasite sati karaṇe lakṣaṇāsaṅgatyāpatterayuktāmapi kiṃ yāvajjīvaguṇasaṃyuktānāmagnihotrādīnāṃ prayogā bhidyante;
GSP28jsbh2-4u:27: uta eka evāyaṃ prayogaḥ kāmyaḥ sa eva yāvajjīva kālaparimita ityevaṃ lakṣaṇasaṃgataprayogabhedābhedaphalakatvena vārtikakāraḥ samarthayāmāsa
GSP28jsbh2-4u:29: vastutastu ---------- prayogāṅgasyāpi yāvajjīvakālasya pūrvaprayoge sāyaṃprātaḥkālāvaruddhe 'varodhasaṃbhavānna yathā pūrvapakṣe prayogabhedakatvam,
GSP28jsbh2-4u:39: uta eka evāyaṃ prayogaḥ kāmyaḥ sa eva yāvajjīvakālaparimita iti vārtikalekhanāt kāmyaprayoge 'yaṃ kālavidhiriti bhramaṃ nivartayituṃ darśapūrṇamāsakarmaṇītyuktam
GSP28jsbh2-4u:40: (kāmya evetyevakāreṇa siddhānte prakaraṇānanugrahasya pūrvapakṣe tadanugrahasya ca sūcanam)
GSP28jsbh2-4u:42: siddhānte 'pyanāśrayaṇāt paurṇamāsyādikālavidhauca tadāśrayaṇe vinigamanāvirahāt atrāpi tadāpatterihaiva karmoddeśena kālavidhāne sati vakṣyamāṇarītyā
GSP28jsbh2-4u:47: (yāvajjīvapadasya ṇamulantatvaṃ na nimittatvena kintu kālavidhitveneti nirūpaṇam)
GSP28jsbh2-4u:49: yāvajjīvapadasya ṇamulantasyāpi yāvaddehaṃ tiṣṭhatītivat nirūḍhalakṣaṇayā kālaparatvopapatteḥ
GSP28jsbh2-4u:50: abhikrāmaṃ juhotītyatra ṇamulantasyāpi nimittaparatvādarśanādiha kālavidhireva yukta ityarthaḥ /
GSP28jsbh2-4u:54: atra prācīnaiḥ siddhānte paurṇamāsyamāvāsyayordarśapūrṇamāsānuṣṭhānena jīvanaparyāptakālānugrahāsaṃbhavāt yāgābhyāsavidhānāya yajatāvabhyāsalakṣaṇā pūrvapakṣe āpāditā,
GSP28jsbh2-4u:56: evañca nābhyāsalakṣaṇā natarāñca tasya vidheyatvamityevakāreṇa sūcitam /
GSP28jsbh2-4u:61: ataeva vidheyatāvacchedakatayā jīvanaparyāpteṣu tāvatsu vyāpyaprayogeṣu tattadvidheyatāvacchedakatayā
GSP28jsbh2-4u:64: vyāpyavyāpakaprayogaviśiṣṭakarmaṇaḥ phalāpekṣāyāṃ svargakāmādivākyena svargārthatayaiva viniyogāt svargādyeva phalam,
GSP28jsbh2-4u:65: natu yāvajjīvavākyena pāpakṣayārthatvena viniyogāt pāpakṣayaḥ pṛthak phalamityarthaḥ /
GSP28jsbh2-4u:66: evañca jīvanaparyāptaistāvadbhiḥ prayogaiḥ ekameva phalaṃ svargādi bhavati,
GSP28jsbh2-4u:71: vastutastu ----------- vyāpakaprayogeṇaiva nirvāhe tattadvyāpyaprayogasvīkāre naiva kiñcit pramāṇam /
GSP28jsbh2-4u:73: paurṇamāsyādivākyeṣu vyāpakaprayogānuvādena tattatkālavidhāne 'pi jīvanakālāvacchedakatvavidhayā tattatkālaniveśasaṃbhavasyaiva niyāmakatvāt
GSP28jsbh2-4u:77: ataeva prayogabhedābhāvena prakṛtasaṅgatyasaṃbhavena viniyogabhedamādāya saṅgatyupapādanaṃ kaustubhoktaṃ saṃgacchate /
GSP28jsbh2-4u:78: tāvatāpica paurṇamāsyādikālāvacchinnajīvanaparyāptakālikaprayogādeva phalaṃ svargādi nāntarā navā pāpakṣayaḥ phalamityasya phalabhedasya na kṣatiriti dhyeyam //
GSP28jsbh2-4u:80: yāvajjīvaśabde hi yāvacchabdasya sāmastyavacanatvāt tasya śakyārthasya puruṣadharmatvena
GSP28jsbh2-4u:82: prācīnoktāmapahāya kālalakṣaṇameva pūrvapakṣe āpādayan siddhāntamāha--------- kālalakṣaṇāpatteriti //
GSP28jsbh2-4u:87: saṃbandhavidhayaiva kālabodhopapattermamāpi na lakṣaṇāpattiriti pūrvapakṣiṇo lakṣaṇāparihārāśayaḥ saṃbandhāśrayaṇe cetyanena sūcitaḥ /
GSP28jsbh2-4u:88: yāvacchabdārthasya vidheyatve ekapadopādānāt viśiṣṭaprayogavidhānādvā vākyabhedānāpattāvapi gauravāpattirlāghavādityanena sūcitā /
GSP28jsbh2-4u:90: padārthavidhayā bhāne lakṣaṇācetyubhayaṃ nimittatvamevetyevakāreṇa vyāvartyaṃ sūcitam //
GSP28jsbh2-4u:92: prāṇakriyārūpāṇāṃ jīvanānāṃ bhedānnimittāvṛttyupapatteḥ jīvanagatasāmastyasya naimittikasaṃbandhitvena prāptatvādanuvāda ityarthaḥ //
GSP28jsbh2-4u:95: yatratu vartamānāpadeśena tacchravaṇam yathā yāvaddohamityatra tatrānuṣṭhānasyaivābodhanena nānuṣṭhāpakatvarūpatadapekṣayā dhātvarthāntarasaṃbandhaḥ,
GSP28jsbh2-4u:102: tataḥ kena vā dohasya nimittatvaṃ vāryate” iti /
GSP28jsbh2-4u:103: ato jīvanasya nimittatvāt nimittasyānuṣṭhāpakatve 'pi prayogākṣepakatve pramāṇābhāvāt
GSP28jsbh2-4u:107: jīvanasya nimittatvānna tithyantarasya jīvane nimittatvasya na vaikasyāmeva paurṇamāsyāṃ
GSP28jsbh2-4u:109: paurvāhṇikakālāvacchinnapaurṇamāsyāmeva pratikṣaṇañjīvanabhedamādāyāvṛttyāpādanaṃ tvaśakyatvādeva na saṃbhavatīti bhāvaḥ //
GSP28jsbh2-4u:123: atra prābhākarairvidheyākaraṇasya vidhinā pratyavāyajanakatvabodhane 'pi karaṇasya naiva kiñcitphalamityaṅgīkriyate /
GSP28jsbh2-4u:126: kāmyamānena svargādiphalenāvaśyakatvānirvāhāt viśvajinnyāyena svargaphalakalpanāyogāt phalaviśeṣāpekṣāyāṃ “dharmeṇa pāpamapanudati,
GSP28jsbh2-4u:128: ” “yadrātryā pāpamakārṣaṃ yadahnā pāpamakārṣaṃ manasā vācā hastābhyāṃ” ityādivākyaśeṣebhyo niṣiddhācaraṇajanyapratyavāyakṣayasya phalatvamavasīyate ityarthaḥ /
GSP28jsbh2-4u:132: akaraṇe pratyavāyabhiyā pravṛttasya pāpakṣayārthaṃ pravṛttyabhāvamapekṣya pāpakṣayasyānuṣaṅgikatvoktiḥ /
GSP28jsbh2-4u:137: prayojanaṃ pūrvapakṣe yāvajjīvamabhyastarūpaka ekaḥ kāmya eva proyagaḥ jīvanakālasya vikṛtau sauryādāvatideśādyāvajjīviko 'bhyāsaḥ,
GSP28jsbh2-4u:138: siddhānte tvaphalakāmasyāpi sāyaṃprātaḥkālayorabhyastarūpastatraivaca parisamāpta ekaḥ prayogaḥ /
GSP28jsbh2-4u:139: sāyaṃprātaḥkālāntare tathaivāparaḥ sauryeca nimittasyānatideśānna yāvajjīvaṃ prayoga iti spaṣṭatvānnoktam //
GSP28jsbh2-4u:145: prakṛte tūktapramāṇairutpattiparatvāvagame 'pi puruṣabhedāttattacchākhādhyāyipuruṣān pratyekasyaiva karmaṇaḥ sarvatrotpattisaṃbhavānna karmabhedaḥ
GSP28jsbh2-4u:149: ata eva vedabhede puruṣābhedādekatraivotpattiraparatra guṇārthaṃ śravaṇabhityatra niyāmakaṃ vakṣyate /
GSP28jsbh2-4u:150: vedaikatve tu pratiśākhaṃ puruṣabhedāt satyapi sarveṣāmutpattiparatve na karmabhedaḥ /
GSP28jsbh2-4u:151: ata evaikasmin karmaṇi viruddhānāṃ nānāśākhāgatāṅgānāṃ vikalpaḥ /
GSP28jsbh2-4u:156: yattu 'bahnalpaṃ vā svagṛhyoktaṃ' ityādivacanantat sarvāṅgopasaṃhārāsaṃbhave 'nukalpavidhānārthamiti kaustubhe draṣṭavyam /
GSP28jsbh2-4u:160: iti śrīkhaṇḍadevaviracitāyāṃ bhāṭṭadīpikāyāṃ dvitīyādhyāyasya caturthaḥ pādaḥ //
GSP28jsbh2-4u:169: ataeva -------- vedāntaragate “bhūyastvenobhayaśrutī“titārtīyanyāyena yatra vede dravyadevatāśravaṇāt rūpalābhastatraivotpattiḥ,
GSP28jsbh2-4u:180: tathā śabdāntarasyāpi samānadhātvarthakatvāt itaradhātvarthāpekṣayā bhedakatvasya siddhānte 'pīṣṭatvānnabhedakatvam /
GSP28jsbh2-4u:190: yathaivādhvaryuṃ vṛṇīte ityatra satyapyadhvaryoruddeśyatve vṛtenādhvaryuṇā svakāryaṃ
GSP28jsbh2-4u:192: tathehāpyadhītena svādhyāyenārthajñānaṃ bhāvayediti kalpyaviniyogavidhau upādeyatvaśravaṇāt tadvivakṣeti nirāsaḥ sūcitaḥ /
GSP28jsbh2-4u:195: “anayā trayyā vidyayā lokaṃ jayati” “vedānadhītya vedau vā vedaṃ vāpi yathākrama”
GSP28jsbh2-4u:204: vedabhedena tadadhyayanasya sarvapuruṣān pratyavirodhāt tadgatavidhipunaḥ śravaṇasyādhyetṛbhedapuraskāreṇa
GSP28jsbh2-4u:205: jñānārthatvena parihārāsaṃbhavāt ubhayotpattau prāptāyāṃ bhūyodharmāmnānaṃ yatra
GSP28jsbh2-4u:206: tatrotpattiritaratra guṇārthaṃ śravaṇamityarthabhūyastvaṃ niyāmakaṃ tṛtīye vakṣyata ityarthaḥ /
GSP28jsbh2-4u:207: evaṃ yatra sāmavede ekasyāmeva śākhāyāṃ pañcaviṃśaṣaṅviṃśākhyabrāhmaṇabhedastatrāpyadhyetṛbhedābhāvādekatra vidhiraparatrānuvādo bādhakāsattve,
GSP28jsbh2-4u:210: tattadadhyetṝn prati ajñātotpattijñāpakatayā vidhipunaḥśravaṇopapatterna karmabheda ityarthaḥ //
GSP28jsbh2-4u:211: evaṃ vidhipunaḥ śravaṇasyānyaparatvādabhyāsasya bhedakatve niraste tenaivānupasthitirūpaprakaraṇāntarasya
GSP28jsbh2-4u:215: ata eva ekatareṇaikatarasya bādhāyogādekārthatve sati vrīhiyavayoriva vikalpa ityarthaḥ /
GSP28jsbh2-4u:216: kāṭhakādisamākhyānāṃ śākhāsviva karmaṇyapi prayogāt tābhirādhvaryavādisamākhyāvat puruṣaviśeṣaniyamopapattyāśaṅkāmabhipretya pariharati ---------- saceti //
GSP28jsbh2-4u:217: karmaṇi prayogasya kaṭhaproktagranthavihitasaṃbandhanimittakasya kartṛtāsaṃbandhena kaṭhādiniyāmakatvāyogāt na tena vyavasthāsiddhirityarthaḥ
GSP28jsbh2-4u:224: śūdrasya tadākṣepasaṃbhave 'pi tadupāyādhyayananiṣedhānna taditi vaiṣamyamiti bhāvaḥ //
GSP28jsbh2-4u:226: nanu -------- śākhāntarīyāṅgopasaṃhāre “bahvalpaṃ vā svagṛhyoktaṃ yasya yāvat prakīrttitaṃ /
GSP28jsbh2-4u:227: tasya tāvati śāstrārthe kṛte sarvaḥ kṛto bhave” diti vacanena svagṛhyapadasyopalakṣaṇatayā
GSP28jsbh2-4u:228: svagṛhyoktasya svaśākhāvagatasya vānuṣṭhānaniyamavidhānāt tena virodha ityāśaṅkānirāsāyāha
GSP28jsbh2-4u:239: teṣāmiti bahuvacanena ataḥ paramityanenaca sūcitottarādhyāyārthanirūpaṇaṃ pratyetadadhyāyārthanirūpaṇasya hetuhetumadbhāvarūpā saṅgatiruttaratra spaṣṭībhaviṣyati //
GSP28jsbh2-4u:241: iti kavimaṇḍana-khaṇḍadevaśiṣya-śuṃbhubhaṭṭaviracitāyāṃ bhāṭṭadīpikāvyākhyāyāṃ prabhāvalyāṃ dvitīyādhyāyasya caturthaḥ pādaḥ //
